choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, milk-based yogurt, garlic, honey, almonds, almond butter, pistachios, and cashews

### Response:


Sure! Here is a healthy meal plan for seven days that includes dairy products such as yogurt or milk-based alternatives. You can also include fruits like garlic, honey, almonds, almond butter and pistachios to keep in mind your dietary restrictions:

1. Morning
2. Breakfast - 3 oz of whole grain bread with yogurt or milk-based alternative for protein (such as skimmed milk), fruit salad/vegetables, and a cup of water if you need it to stay hydrated throughout the day

3. Lunch
4. Salmon sashimi - 2 oz fresh seafood such as salmon or tuna with garlic sauce on top for flavorfulness (optional)

5. Afternoon Snack - a small portion of fruit, vegetable, or protein snack to complete the meal
6. Dinner
7. Rice and Beans/Lentils Salad - 2 oz cooked rice with beans or lentils (such as kidneybeans) for flavorfulness

8. Supper
9. Chicken breast, vegetables, sauce on top of your choice such as spicy chili sauce to add a kick and heat up the meal

10. Dessert - 2 oz ice cream or fruit dessert (such as strawberry shortcake) for sweetness

Remember that these are just suggestions, so you can adjust them according to your personal tastes!
